rules.comment: This example shows how to create a permission that can be used to grant key rotation (BYOK) privileges in the 'Product1' container in the 'SaaS-Applications' workspace. In this case, this permission is allowing the user dtijerina-keyrotationspecialist or the application app-integration-keyrotationspecialist super admin privileges. Once this permissions is created, it needs to be assigned to a role and then the role granted to dtijerina-keyrotationspecialist or the application app-integration-keyrotationspecialist.
